en.assoc_pool_policy_tip: The default pool must have compatible protocol with listener.
en.delete_lb_tip: The loadbalancer associated with the listener can not be deleted
en.no_pool_tip: The protocol of resource pool and listener must be the same, moreover, resource pool and loadbalancer should locate in the same network or subnet.
en.security_group_info: No available security group with subnet
en.tip_lb_assoc_fip: The network which Loadbalancer locates should connect to the outer network, otherwise this action may fail.

zh-CN.assoc_pool_policy_tip: 默认资源池和监听器的协议必须相同。
zh-CN.delete_lb_tip: 当前负载均衡器关联了监听器，无法删除
zh-CN.no_lb: 没有可用的负载均衡器。
zh-CN.no_pool_tip: 资源池和监听器的协议必须相同，并且和该监听器所在负载均衡器属于同一网络或子网。
zh-CN.security_group_info: 没有与子网关联的安全组
zh-CN.tip_lb_assoc_fip: 负载均衡器所在网络必须能够连接外网，否则绑定公网ip可能不成功。
